page.title: 04LOCAL NEWS:THE RIPON GAZETTE
page.content: News features and letters to the editor were summarised over a 6 week period. Vandalism was commented on in all 6 issues"the present methods are inadequate",say the town councillors and they voted to send a letter to the police to express their dissatisfaction,the recreation ground was singled out as having been badly vandalised and also rowdy behaviour in the town centre at night. In the Magistrates Court in every case the criminal offences were concerned with either drunkenness or motor vehicles or both. The Royal visit. the Queens visit to distribute the 'Royal Maunday'at Ripon cathedral provided headlines for several weeks.
